item.title: A certain whale is suspected of selling 700 WBTC in the past 3 days, worth $82.40MAccording to @ai_9684xtpa monitoring, "the address that built a position of 1,074 WBTC at an average price of $10,708.00 four years ago" has allegedly sold 700 WBTC (worth $82.40M) in the past three days, at an average price of $117,697.00. If this portion has been sold, it will yield a profit of $74.89M; currently, the selling progress of the position built four years ago is more than halfway through, and the wallet still holds 800 WBTC. [Wu Blockchain]

The cost was $2,721.00 and the average selling price was $3,757.00 - a profit of $5.08 million in two weeks, with a return rate of 20.30%. [PANews]

item.title: Kaito AI to Launch on Capital LaunchpadAI-powered crypto data platform Kaito AI tweeted that it will launch Capital Launchpad this week. The platform will allow users to participate in token private sales and new project investments, adopting an allocation mechanism based on social reputation, on-chain holdings, and other indicators, replacing the traditional first-come, first-served model. Project parties can independently set financing terms, including investment amount, valuation, and lock-up period conditions, and can review investor qualifications and allocate quotas in stages. The official statement said that all Capital Launchpad fees will be returned to the community. [Foresight News]

The platform will allow users to participate in token private sales and new project investments, adopting an allocation mechanism based o

item.title: Ark Invest Trims Coinbase Shares Worth $90.58M, Also Sells Robinhood and Block HoldingsCathie Wood's investment firm, Ark Invest, sold a total of 218,986 Coinbase shares (COIN) on Monday, worth approximately $90.58M, involving its three ETF products: ARKK sold 174,746 shares, ARKW sold 27,663 shares, and ARKF sold 16,577 shares. This reduction occurred after Coinbase's stock price hit an all-time high last Friday (over $437), at which time the U.S. House of Representatives passed legislation on stablecoins and the digital asset regulatory framework. In addition, ARKW sold 109,824 Robinhood shares (worth $11.46M), and ARKF sold 90,061 Block shares (worth $7.00M). Ark Invest consistently follows a strategy of not exceeding 10% of a fund's portfolio in a single stock, and therefore regularly rebalances positions based on asset price changes. (The Block) [Odaily Planet Daily]

item.title: Over 90% of Ethereum addresses are profitable, the highest since December 2024On July 22, according to Sentora monitoring, more than 90% of Ethereum addresses are currently in a profitable state, a new high since December 2024. Since there are relatively few addresses that have purchased Ethereum above the current price, the on-chain resistance appears to be weak. The first significant resistance level is slightly below the $4,000.00 mark, and currently about 2.39 million addresses hold ETH that is still in a loss. [PANews]

item.title: Coolpad Group Establishes RWA Business Unit to Explore Tokenization of Property AssetsCoolpad Group (02369.HK) has announced the official establishment of the "Real World Asset Tokenization Division" (RWA Division), which will coordinate the tokenization of real-world assets such as properties. Coolpad stated that the company had already started exploring Web3.0-related initiatives in 2023. The establishment of the RWA Division is aimed at more systematically adapting to the development trend of Web3.0 technology and actively responding to the innovative direction advocated by the Hong Kong SAR government's "Digital Asset Development Policy Declaration 2.0." The department is personally led by Chen Jiajun, Chairman of the Board and CEO of the company. [Zhitong Finance]
item.description: 12 minutes agoOdailyCoolpad Group Establishes RWA Business Unit to Explore Tokenization of Property AssetsCoolpad Group (02369.HK) has announced the official establishment of the "Real World Asset Tokenization Division" (RWA Division), which will coordinate the tokenization of real-world assets such

item.title: Robinhood CEO admits OpenAI tokenized stock is ‘controversial’ but is still doubling down on itOn July 22, according to Decrypt, Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev admitted that the company's recent move to provide tokenized stocks is controversial, but he remains steadfast in his determination to expand the program. Tenev said: "Being the first to truly tokenize these companies is a major milestone. Of course, every time you take the lead in doing something interesting, there will always be some controversy. I don't really care about the response to these controversies. The key is to put a product that is truly useful to customers in their hands, and I think (this launch) has achieved this to a large extent." Tenev also expressed his eagerness to advance Robinhood’s tokenized stock initiatives, which he recently said could soon expand to thousands of private companies. “Now it’s just a matter of scaling it to more companies and finding the path to get to phase two and phase three integrations in DeFi,” he added, referring to Robinhood’s long-term plans to integrate its tokenized stock product with decentralized finance markets. [PANews]

[Foresight News]

item.title: Trend Research transferred 1.50M FORM to CEX, and has cashed out 6.00M in the last 3 months, with a profit of approximately $3.90MAccording to crypto analyst Ember@EmberCN's monitoring, Trend Research transferred 1.50M FORM (worth $5.12M) to Binance today. Since withdrawing 9.00M FORM from Binance at the end of April, the address has transferred 3.00M at the end of May (price $2.56), 1.50M at the end of June ($2.58), and now another 1.50M at a price of $3.41. The three transfers total 6.00M FORM, with an average price of approximately $2.78, and an estimated profit of approximately $3.90M. Currently, Trend Research still holds 3.00M FORM, worth approximately $10.44M at the current price. [Odaily]

item.title: Publicly Listed Profusa Signs $100.00M Equity Credit Agreement, Launches Bitcoin Treasury StrategyNasdaq-listed digital health company Profusa (ticker: PFSA) has announced an equity credit agreement with Ascent Partners Fund LLC to raise up to $100 million through the issuance of common stock. The company stated that the net proceeds from the financing will be used entirely to purchase Bitcoin (and may also be used to repay debt), provided that the company's cash balance is higher than $5.00 million at the time of the equity sale. This agreement marks the official launch of Profusa's Bitcoin treasury strategy. (Business Insider) [Odaily]

item.title: Volcon Makes Initial Purchase of 280.14 Bitcoin and Completes Over $500.00M Private Placement to Purchase BitcoinUS-listed electric vehicle company Volcon has purchased 280.14 Bitcoin for the first time and has completed a private placement of over $500.00M. It plans to use more than 95% of the total proceeds from the private placement to purchase Bitcoin. The private placement included participation from institutions such as FalconX, Pantera, Borderless, and Relayer Capital. In the coming weeks, Volcon plans to change its company name to Empery Digital, Inc., and its stock ticker to EMPD. [Wu Blockchain]
